issues.description: The problem statement erroneously specifies that PersonController methods take a Consumer<List<Note>> parameter, but both the template and solution use Consumer<List<Person>>. This mismatch between the description and the code can confuse students about the correct generic type to use in their method signatures.
issues.suggested_fix: In the problem statement (Part 2 description), replace `Consumer<List<Note>>` with `Consumer<List<Person>>` to match the template and solution signatures.
